column5: Hey guys!!  My buddy Ben just launched his website today.  It looks awesome!!  Check it out.  My link  Hopefully it's ok to post it here.  www.BenBeattieOutdoors.com
Very nice Ben love them huge lakers wish we had them down this way that is one thing I sure do miss about ice fishing down here. I will be looking at the site more this week to take it all in.
He seems to be in every outdoor mag I get.

Thanks guys.  Be sure to keep checking out my website - the homepage is a blog that I will regularly update with hunting and fishing reports.  Don't worry though, I'll still share pics here on OFC too.
Look great Ben.  Some of those lakers are just monsters
Excellent Ben Like the look and feel   I'll be sure to add it to my favorites

Really, nice site Ben. There is a ton of work put into websites. Great job it looks great. Very professional and well laid out. Good luck to you in the future and I hope to read more about your adventures, tips and tactics!
The photo gallery is a great place when my 2 year old wants to see "more pictures of fish"  .
What is the significance of the "Matt" buoy?
Find the 'Red Matty' on Lac Seul in July/August and catch walleye all day long!
